definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote

sentences.english: Rural land brought to market illegally is actualy a kind of reasonable system innovation.
sentences.chinese: 农地非法入市实质上是一项合理的诱致性的制度变迁。

sentences.english: The change of this system was closely connected to the religious believes of the Royal house and its material interests.
sentences.chinese: 度牒制度变迁与皇室家族信仰倾向及其利益关系密切。

sentences.english: It reflects the vicissitude of society.
sentences.chinese: 它反映了社会的变迁兴衰。

sentences.english: The world is in continuous flux and is impermanent .
sentences.chinese: 世界变迁不已，并非是常久不变的。

sentences.english: The changes of Chinese ancient bowl bottom is the epitome of the whole ancient ceramic history.
sentences.chinese: 碗底足的变迁是整个古陶瓷历史变迁的一个缩影。

sentences.english: The changes of Chinese ancient bowl bottom is the epitome of the whole ancient ceramic history.
sentences.chinese: 碗底足的变迁是整个古陶瓷历史变迁的一个缩影。

sentences.english: The first part discusses China's constitution in the non-public economic-related concepts.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分论述了我国非公经济宪法地位变迁的过程。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the study on the city historical transformation of modern Pudong district.
sentences.chinese: 本文以近代浦东城区历史变迁为研究对象。

sentences.english: Chapter Three: It talks about the progress of tying economic theory.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是搭售理论的变迁。

sentences.english: Therefore, the archives should adjust to the change of society and make efficient reformations on its own accord.
sentences.chinese: 档案馆应主动适应社会的变迁，进行有效的改革。

sentences.english: Third, the paper pays close attention to changes of the settlement pattern of modern Yuangong village.
sentences.chinese: 然后，论文对原公村形态结构的现代变迁进行了关注。

sentences.english: Qiu Xiaofei dedicates his painting to the preservation of insignificant details of the national tradition in transition.
sentences.chinese: 仇晓飞的作品致力于保存民族传统变迁中的小细节。

sentences.english: It is far preferable take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
sentences.chinese: 耐心镇静地接受世事变迁，是最好的处事之道。

sentences.english: Honest government system vicissitude way dependence .
sentences.chinese: 廉政制度变迁的路径依赖。

sentences.english: The weathering layer is an obvious index for sedimentary discontinuity and change of environment.
sentences.chinese: 风化层是沉积间断和环境变迁的明显标志。

definition: lit. the blue sea turned into mulberry fields (idiom)/fig. the transformations of the world
prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
to take over (from one another)/to alternate/to replace/to relay
to flow and change/development and change (of society)
daily renewal, monthly change (idiom)/every day sees new developments/rapid progress
things change with the passage of time (idiom)
lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
